Require("levels/lib/ant.lua")
function file_oxyd(x,y,f) oxyd_default_flavor=f oxyd(x,y) end levelh=13 levelw=20 enigma.FlatForce=30 enigma.SlopeForce=30 enigma.ElectricForce=30 cells={} items={} actors={} stones={} actors[" "]=cell{} stones[" "]=cell{} cells[" "]=cell{} items[" "]=cell{} cells["!"]=cell{floor="fl-sahara"} stones["!"]=cell{stone="st-lasertimeswitch"} stones["#"]=cell{stone="st-rotator-right"} stones["$"]=cell{stone="st-swap"} stones["%"]=cell{parent={{file_oxyd,"b"}}} stones["&"]=cell{stone="st-rotator-left"} stones["'"]=cell{stone="st-fart"} function ac_blackball(x,y) n="" p=0 f=0 if (x==8) and (y==8) then n="ac8x8" p=0 mf=1 end set_actor("ac-blackball",x+0.5,y+0.5,{player=p,name=n,mouseforce=mf}) end actors["!"]=cell{parent={{ac_blackball}}} level={"!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"} acmap={" ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ! "!#!! !!!!", "!!!! !!!!", "! !", "! !", "! !", "! !", "! !", "! !", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"} create_world_by_map(level) draw_map(0,0,stmap,stones) draw_map(0,0,itmap,items) draw_map(0,0,acmap,actors)
